metadata.name: Malicious ShellIntel PowerShell Commandlets
metadata.comment: Detects Commandlet names from ShellIntel exploitation scripts.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('invoke-smbautobrute')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('invoke-gpolinks')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('invoke-potato'))))

output.summary: Detects Commandlet names from ShellIntel exploitation scripts.
